header.title: Hello, my name is Sarta
header.lead: I help businesses stand out with professional logo, packaging, website, and print designs that connect with their audience.
about.title: I’ve got what you need.
about.lead: With years of experience delivering high-quality designs for global clients, I combine creativity with strategic thinking. My goal is not just to make your brand look good, but to make it unforgettable. Whether you need a brand identity, packaging that sells, or a website that converts — I’ll deliver results you can trust.
about.tools.title: The Tools I Use
services.title: My Services
services.logo.desc: Unique and memorable logos crafted to capture your brand’s identity and leave a lasting impression.
services.packaging.desc: Eye-catching and functional packaging that elevates your product and attracts customers at first sight.
services.web.desc: Modern, responsive websites designed to engage visitors and convert them into loyal clients.
services.print.desc: High-quality print materials from brochures to business cards that communicate your message with style and clarity.

reviews.title: What Clients Say
review.1.name: Davinder Raju
review.1.title: Founder of Greener Dentistry Global
review.1.text: I have no hesitation endorsing Sarta. He created attractive visuals for my website, which communicates an important environmental message. The visuals, his use of colour and creativity captured my vision. He has been so easy to work with, fast, responsive, patient, and has a real eye for design. I will be coming back to him for future projects.
review.2.name: Sam Clough
review.2.title: Social Media Manager at AutoForm Engineering GmbH
review.2.text: Sarta is both a great colleague and a good friend. He's creative, dependable, organised, and always ready to support the team. His designs consistently impressed our clients and boosted our campaigns. Highly recommended for any design needs.
review.3.name: Vinay Wangnoo
review.3.title: Founder of Get London Transfer
review.3.text: There’s no doubt, Sarta is patient, skilled, and highly competent. He was able to deliver branding and design that perfectly aligned with our company image. His professionalism and dedication to perfection set him apart. I strongly recommend his services.
review.4.name: Cristian DeOliveira
review.4.title: Founder of Almighty Insurance
review.4.text: I’ve relied on Sarta for a long time for anything related to graphic design. He has never disappointed me. From logo to marketing materials, his creative input and eye for detail have helped my business look professional and trustworthy. Truly a pleasure to work with.
review.5.name: Mattew Knobel
review.5.title: CEO and Co-Owner at What's Your Treat
review.5.text: Sarta helped me design packaging for my CBD products. His designs were not only creative but also practical and market-ready. He listened carefully to feedback and adjusted quickly. I’ll continue working with him on future projects.
review.6.name: Matthew J. Martin
review.6.title: Founder of Martin Van Java Menswear
review.6.text: I first met Sarta through Upwork, where I trusted him to design a logo for my brand. His professionalism, creativity, and timeliness were outstanding. The logo he delivered was beyond expectations and became a foundation for my brand identity. Highly recommend him.

contact.lead: Ready to start your next project with me? Send me a message and I will get back to you as soon as possible!
